thread.title_full: SEE PICS: Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone's pre-Oscar game is strong : Hollywood, News - India Today

title: SEE PICS: Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone's pre-Oscar game is strong : Hollywood, News - India Today
text:
SEE PICS: Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone's pre-Oscar game is strong Deepika Padukone and Priyanka Chopra attended the pre-Oscar dinner hosted by Chanel and Charles Finch. IndiaToday.in | Written by Samrudhi Ghosh A + A - 
Although Deepika Padukone chose to skip the main ceremony, she made sure that she did not miss out on all the fun of the Oscars this year. Deepika made her presence felt at the pre-Oscar parties, attending the one hosted by Women in Film (WIF) as well as the Chanel and Charles Finch pre-Oscar dinner. 'Desi girl' Priyanka Chopra was also present at Chanel event, where she made heads turn in her monochrome ensemble. 
CATCH ALL LIVE UPDATES FROM OSCARS 2017 HERE 
The two were pictured together at the event. Priyanka was earlier clicked having a ball at the WME pre-Oscar party. A post shared by Dp (@deepika_ppadukone_) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:47pm PST A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 26, 2017 at 12:31am PST A post shared by Deepika Padukone (@deepikapadukone) on Feb 26, 2017 at 10:40am PST 
While Deepika made her Hollywood debut with Vin Diesel in xXx: Return of Xander Cage, which went on to make more than $300mn worldwide, Priyanka's big ticket to Hollywood is Baywatch, which also features Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Zac Efron.
